title: Validator: performing for multiple keys

labels.name: Ready For Review
labels.description: A pull request ready for code review

body: @prestonvanloon can I take this issue? I see you are assigned to it
I am on Update RPC proto definitions, implement server side and client side to perform the same behavior. I.e. the client should only accept the first response in a list of assignments
Sounds good to me @shayzluf. I'm not working on it at the moment. I've just assigned to myself as the owner to be accountable that this is done on time (it is urgent). Thanks!

@prestonvanloon on keystore.go there is an assumption that the same password was used to create all keys
Is it ok to assume that?
